content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Producing iron plates
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 4.0, 0.0) - Currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 6.0, 0.0) - Producing iron plates

### Storage chest at position(8.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest (position 8.5, 0.5) - Currently empty

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnaces having no ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before expecting them to produce items. Check the inventory of the furnaces regularly.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
